name: cp-ninja
description: Integrates Superpowers skills into GitHub Copilot for enhanced developer workflow.

chatParticipants.name: cp-ninja
chatParticipants.description: Copilot Ninja grants superpowers to your AI assistant.

commands.name: brainstorming
commands.description: You MUST use this before any creative work - creating features, building components, adding functionality, or modifying behavior.

commands.name: dispatching-parallel-agents
commands.description: Use when facing 2+ independent tasks that can be worked on without shared state or sequential dependencies

commands.name: executing-plans
commands.description: Use when you have an implementation plan and you want to execute it step-by-step

commands.name: finishing-a-development-branch
commands.description: Use when feature work is complete and you need to clean up before merging

commands.name: receiving-code-review
commands.description: Use when you receive code review feedback and need to address it systematically

commands.name: requesting-code-review
commands.description: Use when your code is ready for review and you need to prepare a thorough review request

commands.name: subagent-driven-development
commands.description: Use when executing implementation plans with independent tasks in the current session

commands.name: systematic-debugging
commands.description: Use when debugging complex issues that require systematic investigation

commands.name: test-driven-development
commands.description: Use when implementing new features or fixing bugs using test-driven development

commands.name: using-cp-ninja
commands.description: Use when starting any conversation - establishes how to find and use skills

commands.name: using-git-worktrees
commands.description: Use when starting feature work that needs isolation from current workspace

commands.name: using-superpowers
commands.description: Use when you need guidance on using the Superpowers skill system

commands.name: verification-before-completion
commands.description: Use before claiming task completion to verify all requirements are met

commands.name: writing-plans
commands.description: Use when you have a spec or requirements for a multi-step task, before touching code

commands.name: writing-skills
commands.description: Use when creating new skills or improving existing ones

cpNinja.suggestionCooldown.description: Cooldown period (in seconds) between proactive suggestions.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
